question: M.C. Setalvad, B.N. Rao and Alladi Krishnaswamy Iyer were distinguished members of which of the following parties?
explanation: M.C. Setalvad, B.N. Rao and Alladi Krishnaswamy Iyer were distinguished members of the Servants of India Society. The Servants of India Society was formed in Pune, Maharashtra, on June 12, 1905 by Gopal Krishna Gokhale. All are related to this organization.
